backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor handling user profiles, slot settings, pricing rules, blocked slots, and admin authorization through AccessControl and custom owner checks.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old ownership structure to new multi-owner format by mapping old state into a List-based owners field.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, affected frontend files, involved components, and related test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each key frontend file including components, hooks, pages, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based theme setup defining light and dark color variables and base styling tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the root React app and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React setup configuring router routes, React Query provider, theme provider, and global error boundary.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminBooki: Admin calendar component showing daily slots with booked/blocked status, using backend queries to manage and display slot info.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminOwner: UI card to view, add, and remove admin owners with principal validation and confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/admin/BlockSlots: Dialog to block or unblock a time slot with optional reason input and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/EarningsTr: Displays daily and weekly earnings based on a selected date using earnings query hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/EmergencyO: Form for triggering an emergency ownership reset using a reset code with validation and warnings.
frontend/src/components/admin/PricingRul: Form for viewing and updating pricing rules for various time periods with validation.
frontend/src/components/admin/SlotSettin: Form to configure opening hours and slot durations with validation and update mutations.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessRestr: Displays an admin-only access restriction screen with a button redirecting users to the home page.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and automatic session handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAdmi: Protects admin routes by enforcing authentication, checking admin status, prompting profile setup, and handling redirects and loading states.
frontend/src/components/customer/Availab: Shows available booking slots with formatted times and prices, allowing users to select a slot.
frontend/src/components/customer/Booking: Handles customer booking form input, validates data, triggers booking creation, and redirects to payment.
Displays a summary of booking details including date, time, sport, and total price.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main app layout with header, navigation, footer, route-aware navigation styling, and background pattern.
frontend/src/components/system/AppErrorB: Wraps the app in an error boundary that shows an error screen with reload option when exceptions occur.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, reinitializing on identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity loading, and AuthClient initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, admin checks, ownership actions, and other backend actor interactions.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind CSS layers and defines a dark-themed design system with custom color variables.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Renders the admin dashboard with tabs for calendar, settings, and earnings, including related forms and components.
Handles admin authentication via Internet Identity, ownership claiming, and redirects based on admin status.
frontend/src/pages/customer/BookingConfi: Displays booking confirmation details, loading states, and fallback UI when a booking is not found.
frontend/src/pages/customer/CustomerBook: Customer booking UI that selects a date, checks availability, shows slots, calculates pricing, and displays a booking form.
frontend/src/pages/customer/PaymentPlace: Placeholder payment page showing upcoming payment methods and routing users to booking confirmation.
frontend/src/pages/customer/ReceiptLooku: Form page allowing users to enter a booking ID and navigate to its confirmation/receipt.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing features, requirements, issues, and new feature requests.
